casebody.data:
UNITED STATES SHIPPING BOARD EMERGENCY FLEET CORPORATION and Clyde Steamship Company, Plaintiffs in Error, v. John V. HART, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 16, 1925.) No. 224. Ralph C. Greene, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Joseph M. Dreyer, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiffs in error. Arthur Lavenburg, of New York City, for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
